main_definition: Currently present or in operation; being experienced or occurring.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be found or exist; to have a presence in reality
meanings_and_examples.example: Many ancient civilizations are now existing as ruins and artifacts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The state of being present at the time of an event, fact, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: There were several companies existing in that industry before our startup launched.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Existing as a concrete form; having actual physical presence or existence
meanings_and_examples.example: The building is the only remaining example of Victorian architecture in town, so it's an important part of local history and culture.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To exist within a particular domain, area, or context
meanings_and_examples.example: Several bird species are known to exist in this remote forest region.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having an actual existence; not merely theoretical or hypothetical
meanings_and_examples.example: The concept of time has existed since ancient civilizations began recording their history.
